name: quietavenue
description: react serverside rendering website with hydration
author: betoluco

scripts.mirror: NODE_ENV=production REACT_APP_DOMAIN_NAME=https://d3cggm3jrv835x.cloudfront.net npm run build && npm run upload-assets
scripts.build: rm -rf ./clientBuild && npm run client-build && npm run server-build

scriptsComments.start: Sets up the api domain name and a development environment and starts a server, as well as hot module reloading
scriptsComments.mirror: Sets up the api domain name, runs the build script setting webpack environment to developmen and runs the upload-assets script
scriptsComments.prod: Sets up the api domain to quietavenue.com, runs the build script setting webpack environment to production
scriptsComments.build: Runs cliend build and server build consecutive. Server build need some resources from clien build
scriptsComments.client-build: Create a folder with the images, css and js bundle that is used for the site rendering using webpack
scriptsComments.server-build: Builds js a bundle for the backend lambda function using webpack
scriptsComments.clear-assets: deletes all the files in the S3 root/staticAssets folder
scriptsComments.upload-assets: uploads all the files in ../frontEndBundle/staticAssets local folder to S3 root/staticAssets
